title: Bug 3622New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: The message in the New Package Wizard is confusing.
EB: The message in the New Package Wizard should provide clear instructions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
